titles.title: Gädlä Zä-Mikaʾel ʾArägawi "Vita of Zä-Mikaʾel ʾArägawi" / Ṭǝntä lǝdätomu lä-mänäkosat "Origin of the Monks" / Śǝrʿatä betä krǝstiyan "Structure of the Church" / Calendaric treatise / Mälkǝʾa Zä-Mikaʾel ʾArägawi "Image of Zä-Mikaʾel ʾArägawi"

shortcontents.shortcontent:
I) Gädlä Zä-Mikaʾel ʾArägawi "Vita of Zä-Mikaʾel ʾArägawi" (fols. 2ra-43vb) II) Ṭǝntä lǝdätomu lä-mänäkosat "Origin of the Monks" (fols. 43va-44rb) III) Śǝrʿatä beta krǝstiyan "Structure of the Church" (fols. 44va-45ra), in Amharic IV) Calendaric treatise (ʾAbušakǝr?): Yä-qwǝṣǝr betu 6 näw mǝnnamǝn bilu ʿǝlät kekros kalǝʿit... (fols. 45va-46vb), in Amharic V) Mälkǝʾa Zä-Mikaʾel ʾArägawi "Image of Zä-Mikaʾel ʾArägawi" (fols. 47ra-52r)
Additiones 1-2.

donors.donor: The original donor is most probably Zä-Wäldä Maryam who i mentioned in supplication formulas. His name has been erased and replaced with that of Gäbrä Mädḫǝn (see also Additio 2).

txstates.txstate: The Ms. is worn and the original binding has been damaged. Only pieces of the front and back boards (probably re-used) have been preserved. Faded or blurred ink (e.g., fols. 3r, 8v, 25v). Some fols. are damaged by rodents (fols. 1r-9v).

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards (broken, pieces of a box re-utilized). Two pairs of sewing stations.

squires.squire: A(1; s.l. 1, stub before 1/fols. 1r-1v) – I(8/fols. 2r-9v) – II(8/fols. 10r-17v) – III(9; s.l.: 6, stub after 3/fols. 18r-26v) – IV(9; s.l.: 6, stub after 3/fols. 27r-35v) – V(8/fols. 36r-43v) –VI(4/fols. 44r-47v) – <VII(5; s.l.: 4, stub after 1/fols. 48r-52v)>. Quire VII was added later, its fols. are of smaller size.

taunit.rl-info: Ruling and pricking are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are partly visible. Ruling pricks are partly visible. Structural pricks are partly visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

phandwritings.phandwriting: Hand a: mediocre and uneven. Hand b: mediocre. Hand c: mediocre. Hand d: poor and rushed.

pchangeofhands.pchangeofhand: Hand a: fols. 2ra-44rb? (Text I and II?). The handwriting appears uneven and irregular. The letters ረ and ፈ are of particular shape (diagonal strokes are strongly curved to the left). Hand b: fols. 44va-45ra (Text III). The handwriting is similar but not identical to that of Text IV. Hand c: fols. 45va-46vb (Text IV). It is difficult to determine whether one or more scribes were involved in writing. Probably the text was written in one hand at several stages. Hand d: fols. 47ra-52r (Text V). The handwriting is crude and very irregular, to some extend due to the lack of ruling.

rubrications.rubrication: Nomina sacra, name of the protagonist; incipit of Text I and its sections; word sälam "salutation"; elements of the punctuation signs and of the text dividers; elements of Ethiopic numerals.

additional.cont: Fol. 44v (at the bottom): Protective prayer.
additional.det: Written in the same hand as Text I.

additional.cont: Fol. 45ra: Donation note.
additional.det: Gäbrä Mädḫǝn is mentioned as the (later) donor. The note is written in moderate vermillion in the same hand as the one which inserted the name of the (later) donor Gäbrä Mädḫǝn into supplication formulas throughout Text I.

extras.extra: - The name of the original donor Zä-Wäldä Maryam, mentioned in supplication formulas of Text I, has been erased and replaced with that of Gäbrä Mädḫǝn (7rb, 13vb, 19va, 33rb, 41rb, 42vb). - Spaces left for (rubricated) names in Text II are not filled. - Tämälläs-signs (in the shape of +) indicating the place where the omissions, written in the upper margin, belong: e.g., fols. 31vb l.12, 47ra l. 12. - Interlineal corrections in small script added by a secondary hand: e.g., fols. 4va, 11rb, 14va, 34ra. - Erasures marked with thin (red) lines: e.g., fols. 26ra, 35rb, 44va. - Pen trial and writing exercise: fol. 1r. - Minor notes to Text I: fols. 10v, 28r. - Crude drawings and scribbles: fol. 1rv.

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: - Names of the days of the week indicating the readings are written in the upper margin of some fols., in frames: ዘሰኑይ: fol. 2ra ዘሠሉስ: fol. 7va ዘረብዑ: fol. 13vb ዘሐሙስ: fol. 19va ዘአርብ: fol. 25vb ዘቀዳም: fol. 30vb ዘእሁድ: fol. 36rb.
